writer.name: 埃里克·格拉韦尔 Eric Gravel

director.name: 埃里克·格拉韦尔 Eric Gravel

introduction: A man wakes up, gets out of bed and heads to the bathroom to brush his teeth. He is horrified to see in the bathroom mirror that he has three eyes. He awakens to learn that that third eye was only a dream, as he gets out of bed and heads to the bathroom to brush his teeth for real this time, or so he believes, as yet another similar but different horrid bodily issue befalls him. It is yet another dream, which begins the cycle all over again to yet another dream, which becomes faster and more nightmarish with each awakening. Will he ever really wake up and if so will any of these horrid bodily issues ever be real?
